title: (x) "Airbag" identification and Photoshop question - Magnesium {Mark S}
content: Guest, also look at a textured file using layer modes like overlay over your blue layer and control the amount of texture using a layer mask.
author: dan

comments.content: Just noticed nobody's I.D.'d the font yet. It's [Magnesium](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125711/http:/www.mvbfonts.com/html/fonts/magnesium/pk_magnesium.htm).

Guest, the best way to make the distressed look would be to add a layer mask and mask the etched areas. You do this so you can change your mind. Other wise use a small eraser and add a drop shadow layer effect. The effect around the Balloon is a outer glow layer effect.
